The wound will heal in 6 weeks. Do not h: Inxeba liza kuphola kwiiveki ezi-6.Sukulalana kwiiveki ezi-6 ukunqanda usulelo okanye ukonakalisa inxeba.Zila ukutshaya, ialkoholi neziyobisi. Gcina umphambili uthe nkqo iintsuku ezi-7-10, kude kwehle ukudumba.Impahla yangaphantsi icoceke yonk'imihla. Engama-briefs, hayi ama-boxers. Musa ukukhathazeka xa igazi elithile lidyobha isibopho.Xa igazi linxuza isibopho, yiya ekliniki ngoko nangoko.
